translations: 超过（exceed 的过去分词）；越出

sentences.translation: 销售量超过了我们的预测。

sentences.sentence: The officers had exceeded their authority.
sentences.translation: 这些官员超越了他们的权限。

sentences.sentence: Readers will be required to pay when they have exceeded a set number of its online articles per month.
sentences.translation: 当读者每月在线（阅读）文章超过规定数量时，他们将被要求付费。
